nodes.text: Archives of the Order of the Esoteric Pulsar

The Order of the Esoteric Pulsar had archives that detailed topics such as spirituality and faith as well as locations of religious significance. "Faith and the Force of Others" was an excerpt from the archives that went over the differing perceptions of the mystical energy field known as the Force as well as the connections between spirituality and the Mid Rim desert moon of Jedha.
